answers.answer: did you eat before taking it? people told me that you could eat before taking it but most also told me that they did eat and fail so when i took it i didnt eat that morning so i would fail and i wouldnt have to take the 3 hr one.
No I didn't eat before it :( and only had water to drink the night before and the day of......my sister had gestational diabetes I'm guessing I will to now.
:( that ***** im sorry. i dont know what that is but doesnt found fun. i hope that everything turns out ok.
You can eat, just nothing sugery. It will most likely help you for the 3 hour. Try toast or plain oatmeal.
I can eat before the three hour test?

I've never had to take the three hour, call your doctor. But for my 1 hour my doctor told me to eat, just make sure it wasn't full of sugar. So I ate 2 pieces of toast with some water, and then had some oatmeal a little before my test. Not eating and then drinking that much sugar would make most people sick, so I would just call and ask them :)
I will call and check thank you!!

question: Well long story short last Wednesday I took my 1hour glucose test felt horrible for two days after ended up in the hospital Monday for pre term labor had to have fluid IV and a shot to stop contractions today I find out I failed my 1 hour and have to do the 3 hour. My midwife said she didn't want to say that's what caused my pre term labor but very well could have ugh anyone go though this?
title: sugar test
